ygData.subject: Skill training while you sleep.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lately Ive been trying to think of a way to train hard-to-learn skills while Im sleeping - such as instill doubt.  I know you can target a corpse and train ID.
ygData.messageBody:
Lately Ive been trying to think of a way to train hard-to-learn skills
while Im sleeping - such as instill doubt. I know you can target a corpse
and train ID. I have set up my sidewinder precision pro, using its profiler
software, to press #s 1-6 (the skill hotkeys) by just pressing 1 button on
the joystick. Thing is, I can't figure out any way to get this button to be
pressed down over and over (if you hold it down with a rubberband or
similar, it will work once, but wont keep pressing your hotkeys all night).
Sidewinder doesnt seem to have auto-fire. I know that gravis makes a
joystick (or is it gamepad?) with autofire but I'd rather not spend a ton of
money - I already pay 8 bucks a month for this game =P
Has anyone put some thought into this? Anyone ever created a
button-presser? Let me know what you folks think - I'd rather not spend my
waking hours pressing hotkeys =)

Kyeric
